department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Transformer oil testing and maintenance for CFB Borden.
description: Transformer oil testing and maintenance for CFB Borden. Bidders are required to submit their bid by June 13, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT.
full_summary:
### Transformer Oil Testing and Maintenance Tender (CFB Borden)
#### Solicitation Number: WS4539532096
#### Brief Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting bids from interested contractors for the provision of transformer oil testing and maintenance services for the Canadian Forces Base Borden (CFB Borden) located in Ontario, Canada.

#### Tender Details
*   **Solicitation Type**: Competitive, Open Bidding
*   **Tender Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
*   **Contract Value**: Not disclosed
*   **Duration**: N/A
*   **Closing Date**: June 28, 2024 (14:00:00 EDT)

#### Tender Location
The tender will be delivered electronically through the Ariba Discovery portal. Bidders are responsible for registering themselves in the system to participate in the tender process.

#### Trade Agreements
Successful bidders must be compliant with the following trade agreements:
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

#### Evaluation Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

#### Contact Information
For inquiries or clarification on the above tender, please contact Stanley Chui (SPAC/PSPC) on either his email: [stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or his phone number: None (Pending an update). However, reference is made to electronic tender notice record, where all details are available.

#### Tender Notice
Please click on the below link for bid submission and continuous updates: [Notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19553086?extsite=MTk1NTMwODZfQU
